name: Hayward MILLER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Miller v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Hayward MILLER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of March, 2011, the Application for Leave to file Original Process is GRANTED, and Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
16 A.3d 501
Hayward MILLER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 158 EM 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 31, 2011.
